content:
I plan to start by committing to a daily meditation practice of at least 10 minutes, using a combination of Headspace and Insight Timer. I'll try to meditate at the same time every day, right after my morning walk, to make it a habit. I'll also explore the free resources you mentioned, such as UCLA Mindful Awareness Research Center and Tara Brach's website, to get a sense of different teaching styles and approaches to meditation.

My goal for the next few weeks is to establish a consistent meditation practice and start to notice the benefits of meditation in my daily life. I'm hoping to feel more centered, calm, and focused, and to improve my overall well-being. I'm also interested in exploring how meditation can help me with stress and anxiety, and how it can improve my relationships with others.

I'm excited to start this journey and see where it takes me. Thanks for your guidance and support!
